content: Altogether, using this method, 8 bits can hold numbers ranging from -128 to 127 (including zero) — a total of 256 numbers. Not a bad pay-off one might presume. The opposite to an unsigned integer is a signed integer that have the capability of holding both positive and negative values.
stemmed: altogeth , use method , 8 bit hold number rang -128 127 ( includ zero ) — total 256 number . not bad pay-off one might presum . the opposit unsign integ sign integ capabl hold posit neg valu .
